org.redpin.server.standalone.db.homes
Class EntityHome<T extends IEntity<java.lang.Integer>>

java.lang.Object
  org.redpin.server.standalone.db.homes.EntityHome<T>
Type Parameters:
T - entity which implements the interface IEntity
All Implemented Interfaces:
IEntityHome<T,java.lang.Integer>
Direct Known Subclasses:
BluetoothReadingHome, FingerprintHome, GSMReadingHome, LocationHome, MapHome, MeasurementHome, ReadingInMeasurementHome, SpinnerDataHome, WiFiReadingHome
public abstract class EntityHome<T extends IEntity<java.lang.Integer>>
extends java.lang.Object
implements IEntityHome<T,java.lang.Integer>

Abstract class which provides an partial implementation of all function needed to add, get, update and remove entities to/from database

Author:
Pascal Brogle (broglep@student.ethz.ch), Luba Rogoleva (lubar@student.ethz.ch)
